title: ARneuroCARE:
Connecting worlds to always remember
section1.text: Discover a new dimension in cognitive care with ARneuroCARE. Our augmented reality content platform offers a unique experience, designed specifically to stimulate minds affected by Alzheimer's. With ARneuroCARE, every interaction is an opportunity to enrich life and mind.

imageContent.title: Cinematic Virtual Reality
imageContent.text: Let’s be the best for more real and effective results and ready to explore the limitless world that we have prepared for you.

content.title: MISSION
content.text: Our mission is to provide effective and accessible tools that promote independence and well-being for people with Alzheimer's, using cutting-edge technology and science-backed methods.

cards.title: ARneurocare: Augmented Reality Content Platform for Alzheimer's Cognitive Stimulation
cards.text: This project aims to develop a platform that utilizes augmented reality technology to provide cognitive stimulation for individuals with Alzheimer's disease.

content.title: Why trust us
content.text: Trust ARneuroCARE because we are supported by an interdisciplinary team of highly trained professionals committed to the well-being of our users. Additionally, our solutions are designed to the highest quality and are backed by rigorous scientific research.

section5.title: Those who have trusted us
section5.text: We've been fortunate to collaborate with leading health institutions, senior care facilities, and compassionate families and caregivers dedicated to addressing Alzheimer's challenges. Our partners include research centers, nursing homes, and non-profits supporting dementia patients.
